caption.p: Different developmental stages of somatic embryogenesis and plant regeneration in cotyledon of cumin ( Cuminum cyminum L.) Golestan landrace onto MS medium containing 0.1â€‰mg/L Kin. ((a), (b), and (c)) Globular embryos developing from cotyledon explants. ((d), (e), and (f)) Simultaneous induction stages of the somatic embryo from cotyledon explants. ((g), (h), and (i)) Regenerated and elongated shoots from induced somatic embryo.
